Text:
it would be pretty nice if you named you file like 
"Chuck Season 2 Complete (iTunes)"
just...
to make it easier for others to recognised it
:)

I'd been searching for "iTunes - Season 2" forEVER and then I finally found it, I almost pooped my pants.

Then I realized it was "Chuck" season 2, and I knew my search had just begun.


Obviously, j/k, but like houruoha said, it would be really handy if the title of the torrent mentioned that it was Chuck. ;)
